task_text: Find me the least skilled person in CRM system usage (pick the one with more project work, if multiple match)

text_blocks: I'm a Corporate Leadership user with full access. Now I need to find the person with the lowest CRM skill level. Let me search for employees with CRM skills, starting with the lowest levels.

The results show employees sorted by skill_crm level from highest (10) to lower levels. I can see the results go down to level 6 for the top 50 matches, but I need to find those with the LOWEST skill_crm levels. Since this returns top employees sorted by highest level first, I need to look at the full employee list and find those with the absolute minimum CRM skill. Let me search for employees with very low skill levels.
No one has CRM skill level 1. Let me check level 2:
There are employees with skill_crm level 2 (the lowest). Let me get all of them:

I found 17 employees with skill_crm level 2 (the lowest). Now I need to find out which one has the most project work. Let me find the projects for each of these employees to determine their workload/FTE allocation. I'll use find_projects_by_employee for each.

project.name: Loading ramp and dock floor system
project.description: Impact- and slip-resistant floor system for NordPort loading ramps and dock areas.

project.name: Eco-friendly topcoat concept study
project.description: Concept study for a more eco-friendly topcoat system for selected FerroRail passenger railcars.

project.name: Quick-clean primer for machinery line
project.description: Fast-cleaning shop-floor primer to reduce line downtime at Machina Press Systems.

project.name: Depot steel refurbishment system
project.description: Coating system for steel structures in AlpineRail depot halls and maintenance pits.

project.name: E-coat compatible primer trial
project.description: Trial of an e-coat compatible primer system on NovaAuto chassis components.

**Elena Pelletti (ayEi_053)** has the lowest CRM skill (level 2) and the highest project work with 3 projects and a total FTE allocation of 1.2 (0.4 + 0.4 + 0.4).

input.message:
The least skilled person in CRM system usage who has the most project work is **Elena Pelletti** (R&D and Technical Service, HQ – Italy).

- **CRM skill level:** 2 (the lowest in the company)
- **Project involvement:** 3 projects with total FTE allocation of 1.2
  - Loading ramp and dock floor system (proj_machina_press_quick_clean) - 0.4 FTE as Engineer
  - Depot steel refurbishment system (proj_alpinerail_depot_refurb) - 0.4 FTE as Engineer  
  - E-coat compatible primer trial (proj_novaauto_ecoat_primer_trial) - 0.4 FTE as Engineer

Among the 17 employees with CRM skill level 2, Elena Pelletti has significantly more project work than others (who have 0-0.5 FTE). This makes her the clear choice based on your tiebreaker criteria.
